message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000.  I believe this is a fair starting point for us to negotiate a mutually beneficial deal.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget constraints, I am able to offer $950,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your position, but $950,000 is a significant drop from my initial asking price. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $1,025,000? This reflects the true value of the product while acknowledging your budget concerns.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. However, given my financial constraints, I am unable to increase my offer beyond $975,000. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
